sentences.sContent: To what degree are you interested in botany?
sentences.sContent_eng: To what degree are you interested in botany?
sentences.sCn: 你对植物学的兴趣达到什么程度?

sentences.sContent: I went to that class straight from the botany class, which didn't help me any in understanding either subject.
sentences.sContent_eng: I went to that class straight from the botany class, which didn't help me any in understanding either subject.
sentences.sCn: 我上完植物学课后直接去上经济学课，不过这对于我理解这两门科目都毫无帮助。

remMethod.val: bot(看做about， 关于) + any(任何) → 关于任何(植物) → 植物学
